short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to pick AI tools for your daily use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension offers a curated selection of AI tools, neatly organized by categories, ensuring easy access to the functionalities you need.This Extension will updates frequently by trending AI tools and Cheat sheets.
